SELECT m.* FROM sys_user_role AS ur
LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS rm ON r.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.order_num ASC

SELECT m.* FROM member_role AS mr LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON mr.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS rm ON r.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS m ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE mr.member_id = #{userId}
ORDER BY m.order_num ASC
